## Goal
Build a comprehensive analytics dashboard for alumni, students, and admins to track referral performance, application funnels, conversion rates, and engagement metrics.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design backend analytics service and Prisma schema changes
- [ ] Implement alumni, student, and platform analytics endpoints
- [ ] Create frontend dashboard components (charts, tables, filters)
- [ ] Add application funnel visualization and monthly trends
- [ ] Integrate authentication and role-based views
- [ ] Write unit/integration tests for analytics aggregation

## Acceptance Criteria
- Dashboard displays all metrics described in the [parent issue](./referral-analytics-core.md)
- Data updates in real-time or near real-time
- All roles (alumni, student, admin) have tailored views
- Tests cover >85% of analytics logic
